meanings.definition: A powder made from roasted, husked, and ground cacao seeds, from which much of the fat has been removed.
meanings.sent1: I added a spoonful of cocoa to my milk for a chocolatey flavor.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a warm cup of cocoa on a cold winter evening.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the cocoa powder for dirt and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rich and comforting as a cup of cocoa on a rainy day.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of cocoa filled the kitchen, inviting everyone to indulge in its sweetness.

meanings.definition: A hot drink made from cocoa powder and milk.
meanings.sent1: Mom prepared a delicious cocoa for me after playing in the snow.
meanings.sent2: The cafe served the best cocoa in town, topped with whipped cream.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over my cup of cocoa, creating a brown mess.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter bubbled up like a cup of freshly made cocoa.
meanings.sent5: The warmth of the cocoa spread through me, chasing away the chill of the night.

meanings.sent1: The cocoa in the garden bore ripe fruits, ready for harvest.
meanings.sent2: The farmer planted a new cocoa to expand the orchard.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkeys swung from the branches of the cocoa, stealing fruits.
meanings.sent4: The cocoa tree stood tall, its leaves dancing in the breeze like green feathers.
meanings.sent5: The shade of the cocoa provided a cool retreat from the midday sun.
